name: Wanderer (V O I D L I N G)
name_original: Wanderer (V O I D L I N G)
description:
This prototype is created for weekly game jam #149

Wanderer is an open world adventure game set in post-apocalyptic realm where AI and robots ruled the world and humanity is lost. You're the last one left. or is it?

You woke up and felt like you've been sleeping for a long time, you somehow lost your memories and didn't know what happen the last few days, all you know is that you might be the last human left.

Survive in this deserted world full of aggressive robots that will attack you on sight.

You'll decide what to do next, It's really up to you if you want to know if there is still human left, or you want to create robots to aid you in your travel, or you can create your battle suit to be strong, or you can create your own robot army to battle against the insane robots around you or you can just sneak past them and hide, well that's the idea.

Controls:

WASD - move

mouse - shoot/look around

left shift - pick up items

B - open bag 

TIPS:

aim for the head

you can drag the panels up down in the inventory to scroll down the contents in the inventory

click the red button beside the item panel in the inventory to drop it

 you can invent things in the game (crafting actually)

i drew everything in this game, well the characters.

i used mostly the standard assets in unity so yeah here it is.

Yeah it still lacks so much but thanks to this game jam I somehow started the idea.

yeah yeah its still almost an empty level, i haven't  really  created much in this game since I still have work at home but yeah sorry for the broken game. cheers!
developers: V O I D L I N G
